name: colorTemperatureMode_setValue
description: This function is used to set the color temperature mode of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the color temperature mode.

parameters.name: predefinedColorTemperatureMode
parameters.description: The predefined color temperature mode to set on the device, such as warm or cool mode.
